title: Event ids not continuous

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Documentation says they should be in order to detect if some were missed by the program using the api (which I was trying to do because my tray icon did not seem to always update correctly)

https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/blob/master/lib/events/events.go#L176 seems to be the reason for this, relevant log where id jumps from 8 to 13 with 4 subscriptions in between:

```
syncthing v0.12.0-beta2 "Beryllium Bedbug" (go1.4.2 linux-amd64 default) unknown-user@syncthing-builder 2015-09-27 20:31:19 UTC
[...]
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:40:48.085865 events.go:144: DEBUG: log 8 StartupComplete map[myID:UYGDMA4-TPHOFO5-2VQYDCC-7CWX7XW-INZINQT-LE4B42N-4JUZTSM-IWCSXA4]
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:40:48.086592 events.go:168: DEBUG: subscribe DeviceConnected
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:40:48.086695 events.go:197: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:40:48.122848 events.go:168: DEBUG: subscribe Unknown
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:40:48.122895 gui.go:228: INFO: API listening on 127.0.0.1:8001
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:41:09.837987 connections.go:238: INFO: Established secure connection to YZJBJFX-RDBL7WY-6ZGKJ2D-4MJB4E7-ZATSDUY-LD6Y3L3-MLFUYWE-AEMXJAC at 127.0.0.1:22001-127.0.0.1:44913 (direct-accept)
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:41:09.838792 events.go:168: DEBUG: subscribe LocalIndexUpdated
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:41:09.838836 events.go:197: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:41:09.839248 events.go:168: DEBUG: subscribe LocalIndexUpdated
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:41:09.839274 events.go:197: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[UYGDM] 2015/09/29 10:41:09.899422 events.go:144: DEBUG: log 13 DeviceConnected map[clientVersion:v0.12.0-beta2 type:direct-accept addr:127.0.0.1:44913 id:YZJBJFX-RDBL7WY-6ZGKJ2D-4MJB4E7-ZATSDUY-LD6Y3L3-MLFUYWE-AEMXJAC clientName:syncthing]
```

(rest/events obviously shows the same jump in id)
